attributes.action: Allow children in grassroots sport to continue training during Covid-19 lockdown
attributes.additional_details: At a time when childhood obesity is already a huge concern in the UK, preventing children from attending training sessions for outdoor sports will affect their physical and mental fitness and cause future health concerns and pressure on our national health service.  If indoor classroom and physical education schooling is allowed, why should grassroots outdoor sport not be able to continue within the frameworks that have already been set out by the relative professional bodies?
attributes.background: Allow children in grassroots sport to continue training during Covid-19 lockdown to avoid physical and mental health impact to the future generations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557785
